meanings.definition: The state or period of being an infant.
meanings.sent1: During my infancy, I learned how to crawl.
meanings.sent2: Her baby brother is still in his infancy.
meanings.sent3: In her infancy, she thought the moon followed her everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The infancy of technology saw the birth of the internet.
meanings.sent5: The innocence of infancy is a precious time in life.

meanings.sent1: The project is still in its infancy and has a long way to go.
meanings.sent2: The infancy of a butterfly begins as a caterpillar.
meanings.sent3: During the infancy of the idea, no one believed it would work.
meanings.sent4: The infancy of a friendship is like planting a seed.
meanings.sent5: The infancy of a plant is fragile and needs care to grow.
